thread.section_title: Distrikt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent experienced - great hotel!
thread.title_full: Excellent experienced - great hotel! - Review of Distrikt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Anita P
title: Excellent experienced - great hotel!
text:
What a find! I got a great AAA deal and it made the stay affordable. Amazing staff, both for reservations (I had to change a date and staff was accomidating), check in, check out and bell staff who held my luggage while I finished sightseeing. I wish I had a chance to have breakfast or visit the restaurant/bar - I'm sure it would have been just as amazing. The location was close to the theatre district, walking distance from Grand Central - couldn't ask for more!
Whenever I'm back in NYC, I will definitely look to stay here again and recommend it to everyone.
